mention.text: Ponomaryov in an open letter published on social networks , in which he quoted the MP s own recent statement opposing Crimea s accession to the Russian Federation and calling Russia s support of the Crimean referendum decision a hypocritical and lowly deed
the only Lower House member who voted against the package of bills that allowed the accession
a member of the Fair Russia caucus
a top Communist Party official in the Soviet Union

an open letter published on social networks , in which he quoted the MP s own recent statement opposing Crimea s accession to the Russian Federation and calling Russia s support of the Crimean referendum decision a hypocritical and lowly deed
a long time Upper House member
several deputies from the nationalist party LDPR
